translations: [化学] 碱度；[化学] 碱性

sentences.sentence: Incorporating organic material into chalky soils will reduce the alkalinity.
sentences.translation: 将有机物质掺入白垩质土壤中将会降低碱性。

sentences.sentence: Seawater, however, is alkaline. This alkalinity causes the glue to set.
sentences.translation: 然而，海水带有碱性，这种碱性就导致了胶质的聚合。

sentences.sentence: Diseases can be prevented or reversed by increasing the alkalinity of the terrain.
sentences.translation: 通过增加内环境的碱性，疾病可以被防止或者逆转。
